page.title: 02Campsmount School
page.content: Campsmount is a mixed comprehensive, serving our local area. This school runs from 8.30am _ 3.10pm. Our dinner hour lasts an hour and midmorning break a quarter of an hour . We do not have an afternoon break. We are allowed packed lunches or paid school meals (at Â£3.00 per week ) or free meals and we may leave school for our meals. We may sign ourselves in if we are late and if we wish to leave early we must obtain a letter from a teacher. We can take it to the office and leave. There are 7x40 minute lessons per day, some doubles. Campsmount overlooks some beautiful scenery, but also Askern pit. Some pupils come from Norton, Askern, Campsall, Fenwick, Smeaton.
